item.title: Becoming billionarie life style
item.description: Sometimes you are better without any friends

item.title: I don't have any friends or hobbies, and it is worth it.
item.description: Sometimes you are better without any friends If life was a videogame i would be still in the early game. People in the early game are not worthwhile. I had friends before but i completely cut ties with them since i stopped playing video games, eating junk food or going to young/teen parties. since these are harmfull activies that do evoke anything good. Stopped talking to friends in the gym because i go to the gym to work out not talk.

item.title: About
item.description: Contact: nicolas@nicolasbianconi.com Technical people can know more about me in here —> https://nicolasbianconi.com/terminalcv/ I am from Brazil, 23 y/o, I don’t have any friends or hobbies. https://nicolasbianconi.com/posts/friends-and-hobbies.md Obcessed with high performance on my work. https://nicolasbianconi.com/posts/become-billionarie-lifestyle.md Want to be known as a 10x dev/person. https://nicolasbianconi.com/posts/what-it-takes-to-be-10x.md Here are some of my projects: Monero Contract System (MVP) https://github.com/nickbrazilian/monero_contract_system Autonomous Dencralized Escrow Sytem (AES) (https://ades.nicolasbianconi.com) (coming soon)
